verses.verse: In the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the king,<WH4428> on the first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the sixth<WH8345> month,<WH2320> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> by the prophet<WH5030> Haggai<WH2292> to Zerubbabel<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel,<WH7597> governor<WH6346> of Judah,<WH3063> and to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Jehozadak,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548> saying,<WH559>

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'This<WH2088> people<WH5971> says,<WH559> "The time<WH6256> has not come,<WH935> [even] the time<WH6256> for the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> to be rebuilt.<WH1129> "'"
Then the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> by Haggai<WH2292> the prophet<WH5030> saying,<WH559>
"Is it time<WH6256> for you yourselves<WH9043> to dwell<WH3427> in your paneled<WH5603> houses<WH1004> while this<WH2088> house<WH1004> [lies] desolate<WH2720>?"
Now<WH6258> therefore, thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> "Consider<WH7760> <WH3824> <WH5921> your ways!<WH1870>

"You have sown<WH2232> much,<WH7235> but harvest<WH935> little;<WH4592> [you] eat,<WH398> but [there is] not [enough] to be satisfied;<WH7654> [you] drink,<WH8354> but [there is] not [enough] to become<WH7937> drunk;<WH7937> [you] put<WH3847> on clothing,<WH3847> but no<WH369> one<WH369> is warm<WH2552> [enough]; and he who earns,<WH7936> earns<WH7936> wages<WH7939> [to put] into a purse<WH6872> with holes.<WH9344>"
Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> "Consider<WH7760> <WH3824> <WH5921> your ways!<WH1870>

"Go<WH5927> up to the mountains,<WH2022> bring<WH935> wood<WH6086> and rebuild<WH1129> the temple,<WH1004> that I may be pleased<WH7521> with it and be glorified,<WH3513>" says<WH559> the Lord.<WH3068>

"[You] look<WH6437> for much,<WH7235> but behold,<WH2009> [it comes] to little;<WH4592> when you bring<WH935> [it] home,<WH1004> I blow<WH5301> it [away.] Why<WH3282> <WH4100>?" declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> "Because<WH3282> of My house<WH1004> which<WH834> [lies] desolate,<WH2720> while each<WH376> of you runs<WH7323> to his own house.<WH1004>
"Therefore,<WH5921> <WH3651> because<WH5921> of you the sky<WH8064> has withheld<WH3607> its dew,<WH2919> and the earth<WH776> has withheld<WH3607> its produce.<WH2981>

"And I called<WH7121> for a drought<WH2721> on the land,<WH776> on the mountains,<WH2022> on the grain,<WH1715> on the new<WH8492> wine,<WH8492> on the oil,<WH3323> on what<WH834> the ground<WH127> produces,<WH3318> on men,<WH120> on cattle,<WH929> and on all<WH3605> the labor<WH3018> of your hands.<WH3709>"

Then Zerubbabel<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel,<WH9611> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Jehozadak,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest,<WH3548> with all<WH3605> the remnant<WH7611> of the people,<WH5971> obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430> and the words<WH1697> of Haggai<WH2292> the prophet,<WH5030> as the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430> had sent<WH7971> him. And the people<WH5971> showed<WH3372> reverence<WH3372> for the Lord.<WH3068>

Then Haggai,<WH2292> the messenger<WH4397> of the Lord,<WH3068> spoke<WH559> by the commission<WH4400> of the Lord<WH3068> to the people<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "'I am with you,' declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>"

So the Lord<WH3068> stirred<WH5782> up the spirit<WH7307> of Zerubbabel<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel,<WH9611> governor<WH6346> of Judah,<WH3063> and the spirit<WH7307> of Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Jehozadak,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest,<WH3548> and the spirit<WH7307> of all<WH3605> the remnant<WH7611> of the people;<WH5971> and they came<WH935> and worked<WH6213> on the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> their God,<WH430>
on the twenty-fourth day<WH3117> of the sixth<WH8345> month<WH2320> in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the king.<WH4428>
